name: Graveyard Shift (itch) (Onnox)
description:
The Game

It's Halloween, and Jack has forgotten to stock up on sweets for the trick-or-treaters. The shops are closed so he heads down to the next best place he knows: the local graveyard!

Jack must collect as many sweets as he can while dodging the skeletons. Thankfully the skeletons aren't too smart, and can be defeated with some quick manoeuvring.

Graveyard Shift was created in 10 days for The GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022.

Project source and full list of third party assets available on GitLab.

Controls
Keyboard
ControllerMoveArrows or WASD
Left stick
PauseSpace
Menu
MuteM
View
Start Game/Play Again
SpaceA
